# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

**Note**: This changelog is automatically generated by our CI/CD pipeline based on [Conventional Commits](https://www.conventionalcommits.org/).

## [Unreleased]

### Added
- Initial release of AOP.Logging.NET framework
- Core library with attribute-based logging (`LogClass`, `LogMethod`, `LogParameter`, `LogResult`, `LogException`, `SensitiveData`)
- Source Generator for compile-time method interception using Roslyn
- Integration with Microsoft.Extensions.Logging
- Dependency Injection extensions for IServiceCollection
- Support for async/await methods
- Structured logging with contextual information
- Configurable logging options (namespaces, classes, log levels)
- Sensitive data protection with `[SensitiveData]` attribute
- Execution time tracking
- Parameter and return value logging
- Exception logging with detailed information
- Sample project demonstrating all features
- Comprehensive unit tests with xUnit, FluentAssertions, and NSubstitute
- Documentation (README, CONTRIBUTING, VERSIONING)
- Automated semantic versioning with semantic-release
- CI/CD workflows with GitHub Actions

### Fixed
- Source Generator project reference compatibility issue (netstandard2.0)
- Missing Microsoft.Extensions.Options package reference in Core library

---

## Version History

Detailed release notes are automatically generated and available on the [GitHub Releases](https://github.com/dborgards/aop.logging.net/releases) page.
